title: The double descent a poem.
author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.
notes: Attributed to Ames by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
T.p. contains quotation from Act 4 of Dryden's "Spanish Fryer."
Pages 13-14 lacking in numbering only; p. 15-22 have different type face from rest of work.
Reproduction of original in the Abbotsford Library.
